company.name: Dern-Support IT
company.description: Dern-Support IT is a trusted provider of IT technical support and computer repair services. We offer on-site support for businesses and drop-off/courier services for individual customers, ensuring fast and reliable solutions for all your IT needs.

contact.description: We value clear communication and are always here to assist you. Whether you need help with computer repairs, software troubleshooting, or hardware upgrades, our team is ready to provide the expertise and service you need to keep your systems running smoothly.

onsite-service.name: On-Site IT Support
onsite-service.description: Our technicians provide on-site support for businesses, ensuring minimal downtime and maximum productivity.

repair-service.name: Computer Repairs
repair-service.description: We offer fast and reliable repair services for both hardware and software issues. Drop off your device at our office or arrange for courier pickup.

software-service.name: Software Troubleshooting
software-service.description: From virus removal to operating system updates, we provide comprehensive software solutions to keep your systems secure and efficient.

data-service.name: Data Recovery
data-service.description: Lost important files? Our data recovery experts can help retrieve your data from damaged or corrupted devices.
